skeletonlisp.LExp
Class CondCase

java.lang.Object
  skeletonlisp.LExp.LExp
      skeletonlisp.LExp.CondCase

public class CondCase
extends LExp

CondCase is used for Cond-expressions, it holds one predicate - result-pair. The first result of such case, whose predicate evaluates to something other than NIL in an LCond (cond-expression) is returned when evaluating the LCond.

Field Summary
private  LExp predicate
          a predicate of an LCond is stored here.
private  LExp result
          the result for this predicate is stored here.

Constructor Detail

CondCase

public CondCase(LExp _predicate,
                LExp _result)
The constructor for CondCase. The constructor requires for each cond-case to have a proper predicate and result. The type of CondCase is initialized with CONDCASETYPE.

Parameters:
_predicate - the predicate for a cond-case
_result - the result for a cond-case
